title: where to find current communities and info for TT & Dominion?
body:
New player here. I've been looking around and it's hard to find any communities that primarily support/discuss 3x3 or dominion and aren't dead. Most of the links I've found for builds, streams, guides, etc are going to info from 2013 or older, a few from late 2014. Where do people talk today?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
as much as I'd love more dominion stuff, I can't find much
but for a good TT stream, check out http://www.twitch.tv/alaric_ventris

TT and Dominion have (or did have I don't know anymore) a bunch of bots set to effectively farm IP. Don't know if that was addressed recently or not but you should prolly just stick to Summoners Rift.
